law.catch_line: In this title, "contractual employee" means an individual:...

text.section:
In this title, "contractual employee" means an individual:
who, under a written agreement, provides temporary personal services to the State for pay;
who is not employed in a budgeted position; and
who has an employer-employee relationship with the State in which the State:
furnishes necessary tools and a place to work;
has the right to control and direct the details, means, and results of the performance of the services; and
has the right to discharge the individual from employment.

"Contractual employee" does not include an individual who is employed as:
an employee in the:
skilled service;
professional service;
management service; or
executive service; or
an emergency employee.
